column4: I know there are programs like kppp and gnome-ppp to help people use dial-up internet, but how do I do it without them?  They're frontends to something, right?
ulteo: how old is the drive?
let me dig u up a url
incidently.... I'm having burning issues with feisty as well if you're interested
I think he said he's on Vista
I know... I was just speaking to you
on the off chance that you knew more about troubleshooting cdburing issues in feisty
I can try, but I know more about Fedora.
thanks for telling me what I need to look up (ppp docs), btw
here's the official ppp howto: http://www.tldp.org/HOWTO/text/PPP-HOWTO
that's been used........... since the dark ages ...still just as valid now
only difference is... now we have package management
